attributes.additional_details: No details have ever been released as to the cause of deaths. No details have been released of the driver or the circumstances as to how she killed two females.
attributes.background: To look into why no further action was taken for the driver that caused the death of a mother and young daughter on a road crossing on a Sunday morning.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Investigating road traffic accidents and pottential crimes are a matter for the police. If you think a crime has been committed, you should contact the police: https://www.police.uk/pu/contact-us/

If you have concerns about your local police you could contact your local Police and Crime Commissioner, you can find out who that is here https://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/

You may also wish to contact your local MP. You can find out who that is here https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
